business_purpose: Uber Eats is a leading food delivery platform that
business_description: Uber Eats is a leading food delivery platform that connects customers with local restaurants and grocery stores. It offers a wide variety of food options from different cuisines and allows users to order meals and have them delivered directly to their doorstep. Uber Eats also supports grocery delivery, enabling users to order essential items from nearby stores.
custom_requirements: give available meals in to the users help as caller
business_context: Business providing Uber Eats - food dilivery system - Uber Eats is a leading food delivery platform that services

suggested_features.name: Order Tracking
suggested_features.description: Real-time updates on the status of the order, including when it's being prepared, picked up, and en route.

suggested_features.name: Delivery Estimates
suggested_features.description: Accurate delivery time estimates to keep customers informed.

suggested_features.name: Order Cancellation
suggested_features.description: Ability for customers to cancel or modify their orders before delivery.

suggested_features.name: Restaurant Reviews
suggested_features.description: Customer reviews and ratings for restaurants and delivery personnel.

suggested_features.name: Special Instructions
suggested_features.description: Option for customers to add special instructions for their orders.

suggested_features.name: Grocery Specific Features
suggested_features.description: Additional features for grocery orders, such as item availability and expiration dates.
